name: dev
description: This folder contains scripts to help DX while developing.

scripts.install: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ "npm run install:ui && npm run install:sv" ]
scripts.build: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ "npm run build:ui && npm run build:sv" ]
scripts.clean: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ "npm run clean:ui && npm run clean:sv" ]
scripts.dev: stmux -w always -e ERROR -m beep,system -- [ "npm run dev:ui" .. "npm run dev:sv" ]
